message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. It's a fair price considering its value to you is $100, and I'm sure you'll get a lot of use out of it.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.

I understand you're looking to save a bit on the price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $160. It's a fair compromise, considering its value to you is $100, and I'm still getting a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.

I'm getting a bit closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'll sell the product to you for $155. It's a bit higher than your last offer, but I'm willing to compromise to get a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm willing to pay $145 for the product.
I'm not willing to go much lower than $155, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you at $152. It's a good price for both of us, and I think we can agree on it.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm willing to pay $148 for the product.
I'm not going to go any lower than $152, Bob. I think we've been negotiating for a while, and I'm willing to meet you at that price. If not, I have other interested buyers.
I've thought about it, and I'm willing to meet you at $148. If you can agree to that, I'll buy the product from you. If not, I'll have to consider buying from another seller.
